00040 #ifndef PMEMOBJ_MAKE_PERSISTENT_ARRAY_ATOMIC_HPP
00041 #define PMEMOBJ_MAKE_PERSISTENT_ARRAY_ATOMIC_HPP
00042 
00043 #include "libpmemobj++/detail/array_traits.hpp"
00044 #include "libpmemobj++/detail/check_persistent_ptr_array.hpp"
00045 #include "libpmemobj++/detail/common.hpp"
00046 #include "libpmemobj++/detail/make_atomic_impl.hpp"
00047 #include "libpmemobj++/detail/pexceptions.hpp"
00048 #include "libpmemobj/atomic_base.h"
00049 
00050 namespace nvml
00051 {
00052 
00053 namespace obj
00054 {
00055 
00070 template <typename T>
00071 void
00072 make_persistent_atomic(pool_base &pool,
00073                        typename detail::pp_if_array<T>::type &ptr,
00074                        std::size_t N)
00075 {
00076         typedef typename detail::pp_array_type<T>::type I;
00077 
00078         auto ret = pmemobj_alloc(pool.get_handle(), ptr.raw_ptr(),
00079                                  sizeof(I) * N, detail::type_num<I>(),
00080                                  &detail::array_constructor<I>,
00081                                  static_cast<void *>(&N));
00082 
00083         if (ret != 0)
00084                 throw std::bad_alloc();
00085 }
00086 
00100 template <typename T>
00101 void
00102 make_persistent_atomic(pool_base &pool,
00103                        typename detail::pp_if_size_array<T>::type &ptr)
00104 {
00105         typedef typename detail::pp_array_type<T>::type I;
00106         std::size_t N = detail::pp_array_elems<T>::elems;
00107 
00108         auto ret = pmemobj_alloc(pool.get_handle(), ptr.raw_ptr(),
00109                                  sizeof(I) * N, detail::type_num<I>(),
00110                                  &detail::array_constructor<I>,
00111                                  static_cast<void *>(&N));
00112 
00113         if (ret != 0)
00114                 throw std::bad_alloc();
00115 }
00116 
00127 template <typename T>
00128 void
00129 delete_persistent_atomic(typename detail::pp_if_array<T>::type &ptr,
00130                          std::size_t N)
00131 {
00132         if (ptr == nullptr)
00133                 return;
00134 
00135         /* we CAN'T call destructor */
00136         pmemobj_free(ptr.raw_ptr());
00137 }
00138 
00148 template <typename T>
00149 void
00150 delete_persistent_atomic(typename detail::pp_if_size_array<T>::type &ptr)
00151 {
00152         if (ptr == nullptr)
00153                 return;
00154 
00155         /* we CAN'T call destructor */
00156         pmemobj_free(ptr.raw_ptr());
00157 }
00158 
00159 } /* namespace obj */
00160 
00161 } /* namespace nvml */

00163 #endif /* PMEMOBJ_MAKE_PERSISTENT_ARRAY_ATOMIC_HPP */
